snippet: In an appointment with election-year ramifications, Cecilia Muñoz will be director of the Domestic Policy Council.
abstract: In an appointment with election-year ramifications, Cecilia Muñoz will be director of the Domestic Policy Council.
lead_paragraph: The White House said Tuesday that Cecilia Muñoz, who has led its efforts to overhaul immigration laws, had been named director of the Domestic Policy Council, making her one of President Obama's chief advisers on a broad swath of issues, including education and gay rights.

headline.main: Hispanic Adviser Is Promoted at White House
